thread.title_full: ABC24 wants your Memphis area winter photos and videos! | localmemphis.com

author: Gus Carrington
title: ABC24 wants your Memphis area winter photos and videos! | localmemphis.com
text:
MEMPHIS, Tenn. — With snow accumulating in Memphis and surrounding areas, ABC24 is looking for viewer submissions that capture moments of fun in the flurries.
Those who would like a chance at seeing themselves or loved ones on the air can send photos or videos to the following number:
(901) 321-7520 Be sure to include your name as well as what part of town you are in with submissions.

We ended up with about 6” of snow total. @ABC24Memphis pic.twitter.com/RS2RDVCWQx
— Trevor Birchett ⚡️ (@weathertrevor) January 15, 2024 As always, it can be critical to remember to stay safe during inclement weather. Here is a link as a reminder of the "Four Ps" of cold weather.
For those that need a place to stay warm through the inclement weather, The Hospitality Hub will open emergency warming centers for extended hours due to the upcoming freezing temperatures.
Here are the anticipated hours for Friday, Jan. 12 through Thursday, Jan. 18:
Friday: 7 p.m. to 11 a.m. 24 hours a day starting 7 p.m. Saturday until Thursday. Those who need a ride to the warming center via MATA can contact Hospitality Hub at 901-297-1680 during warming center hours.
